name: 楊心怡
objective:
本課程將針對數位學習教學設計的相關研究進行探討以及對現行數位教學設計實例分析、未來趨勢、及對未來研究的方向探討。
The course is designed to research on instructional design of e-learning and related issues including systematic design and special topics related to instructional design of e-learning and discussion for the future trends.
